# Healthcare Selector

## Background

This is designed by <a href="https://twitter.com/tigerloveslobs1" target="_blank"><b>Tiger Tang</b></a> and aims to make healthcare selection less burdened and provide direct insights of costs/payable under different bill projections.

## Key Definition

Items                   | Descriptions
------------------------|----------------
HSA contribution        | Dollar amount for 12 month. Some companies offers either HSA or FSA with matching rules. Leave this empty if that does not fit your case.   
HSA company match       | Dollar amount for 12 month. Some companies offers either HSA or FSA with matching rules. Leave this empty if that does not fit your case.
